name: ShapeOminoes
description:
GOAL
The goal is simple: fill generated shape three times using different types of ominoes.

LEVELS
Each level has its own unique shape to fill and consists of three sublevels that need to be solved in order to unlock the next one. Each sublevel has its own omino type to use. Difficulty is scaling throughout the entire game. In the beginning, levels are simple and teach how to play. After that, they get bigger, more complicated and more challenging. There are over 120 levels in total to solve.

HOW TO PLAY?
- Swipe to move omino
- Tap once to rotate
- Tap twice to mirror
OR
- Pick desired omino and swipe it to correct place like in jigsaw puzzles

FEATURES
- 360+ challenging puzzles to solve
- No time pressure, no move limits, no points, no grades
- No ADS, no IAPs, no extra payments
- Friendly for colorblind people
- Minimalistic design & ambient soundtrack
- Supports both smartphones and tablets
- Haptic Feedback support
- iCloud support
- No Internet required

WHAT ELSE?
Game is suitable for both kids & adults. It doesn't matter if you are 5, 15, 30 or 60 - everyone can enjoy these relaxing abstract jigsaw puzzles.

Download now and fit all the ominoes to the board. :)
